amendment.description: Amendment provides that the Secretary may make grants to State and local authorities for the purpose of undertaking capital projects.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 16 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds in contravention of section 5309 of title 49, United States Code.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A061) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A061) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
